Package se.gu.faxe

Class FAXE

java.lang.Object
se.gu.faxe.FAXE
public class FAXE
extends java.lang.Object
This class offers the access to the library functions to extract embedded annotations of your project/source code.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FAXE()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<se.gu.faxe.ConsistencyViolation> checkConsistency​(java.io.File file)
    Check consistency according to embedded annotation specification and returns detected ConsistencyViolations Check is performed for one file or a folder, including sub-assets.

      public int renameFeatureName​(LPQ lpq_before, java.lang.String lpq_after) throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
